original_title: Baby care advice is always updating. Here are 5 key messages that have changed over the years | CNN
article_summary: Pediatrician Dr. David Hill, with over 25 years of experience, emphasizes the importance of seeking reliable sources for parenting advice, building a strong parent-pediatrician relationship, and understanding that "normal" can vary greatly among children. He also notes the evolution of child health science over the years.</s>
